---

description: "Uses the GA4GH workflow execution service API to launch a new run. Runs are launched in the user workspace context by default. To launch in an organization workspace context, include the `workspaceId` in `workflow_engine_parameters`. Runs are launched with the workspace primary compute environment by default. To launch with a different compute environment, include the `computeEnvId` in `workflow_engine_parameters`."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"GA4GH: Launch run"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/ga4gh/wes/v1/runs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Uses the GA4GH workflow execution service API to launch a new run. Runs are launched in the user workspace context by default. To launch in an organization workspace context, include the `workspaceId` in `workflow_engine_parameters`. Runs are launched with the workspace primary compute environment by default. To launch with a different compute environment, include the `computeEnvId` in `workflow_engine_parameters`.
